display_long_description:
# Marmo
Marmo is a VR playground built to capture the energetic style of 2023 fan-made experiences. Movement is fully physical with swinging your arms, giving the freedom to explore the game.

# The Shop
 The shop offers a rotating set of cosmetics, including featured items and seasonal options, giving plenty of ways to customize your look.

# The PVP
For competitive players, the PvP area delivers fast, moving combat with a selection of unlockable weapons. Each option introduces its own playstyle, encouraging skill, positioning, and quick decision making.

# The Team
Marmo blends the nostalgic fan-game feel with a modern polish. Developed by ScreenVR and Lucid we try our best to get what the community wants into the game, and collaborate with eh community on ideas and features.
